Introducing KVM SSD Cloud Servers hosted on our custom [**Openstack**](https://www.openstack.org/) cloud platform.

[**Shark 512 - Order here!**](http://armorshark.com/billing/index.php?/cart/cloud-server/)

[**Shark 1024 - Order here!**](http://armorshark.com/billing/index.php?/cart/cloud-server/)

Located in **PhoenixNAP datacenter** in **Phoenix, Arizona**.<br />
For **CUSTOM** requirements (additional **RAM/CPU/disk**) or pre-sales questions, contact sales at sales@armorshark.com or reply to this thread.
